title: Strange noises from the Red Fountain
body:
Hi everyone,

Can anyone confirm that in the red team's fountain, there is a strange loud humming and whirring sound? (it is only the red fountain, not the blue one.) Otherwise I must be going crazy- I swear that I never heard those sounds before this patch...

My theory is, if it is not a bug on my computer, it could somehow be related to content coming soon... {{champion:41}} rework???

Cheers,
-Anserem

replies.body: I have this too, its really annoying, and i dont know why its there, also (although i havent heard it in a while, they may have fixed it) i hear constant ezreal ult and laser turret sounds, like on a constant loop when i go near where ezreals ult went or the nexus turrets, it drove me crazy,
